message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate you considering me. However, I'm hoping to get a better price. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $10,000?

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can see that you're willing to pay $10,000, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $11,500.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I see your value in the product, $11,500 is still a bit high for my budget. How about we split the difference and I offer you $11,000 for it?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm glad we're close to a deal. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I'm willing to make a small concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product.
